actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-645.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 341 - 74 (Record Vote No: 182).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 350) providing that the President shall continue to adhere to the numerical sublimits of the SALT agreements as long as the Soviet Union does likewise.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. Con. Res. 350 (arms control agreement compliance).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 350) providing that the President shall continue to adhere to the numerical sublimits of the SALT agreements as long as the Soviet Union does likewise.
